objects.text:
• Prevents Hair Fall & Boosts Growth
• Adds Strength & Natural Shine
• With Onion Oil & Redensyl
• For All Hair Types

product_details.name: Mamaearth Onion Hair Oil with Onion Oil & Redensyl for Hair Fall Control | Boosts Hair Growth | Adds Strength & Shine | 200 ml
product_details.description: Country of Origin: India. Item part number: 8904417310245. Product Dimensions: 15.5 x 5 x 5 cm; 200 g. Item Weight: 200 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 15.5 x 5 x 5 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 200.0 millilitre. Generic Name: Hair Oil.

banner_details:
The banner features a promotional layout for a hair oil product with a clean and structured composition. The background uses soft cream tones with faint organic line patterns and dual rectangular borders to create depth. It introduces a bold message using two dominant headline text layers (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) in bold green typography to emphasize hair strength. This is followed by a deep brown stylized subheading (`subheading`) presenting the product name for brand anchoring. A benefits list (`description`) in minimalist font communicates product features clearly. Pricing is called out prominently (`price`) in bold brown, and a green rounded-button (`cta_background` with `cta`) invites user action. The right side is visually balanced with a high-quality image of the hair oil bottle (`product_image`). 

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Forest Green: `#4A7C59`
- Rich Brown: `#6E3426`
- Cream White: `#F5F1ED`
- Charcoal Gray: `#4A4A4A`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image utilizes a fresh and earthy color palette to convey natural and health-focused attributes. Dominant colors include a rich **deep maroon** (#7B1B2E) from the onion, symbolizing strength and vitality, paired with a **natural green** (#A2C23D) background that implies natural ingredients and freshness. A soft **lavender pink** (#D9A3B8) is found in the onion cross-section, adding a gentle, soothing touch. The brand name features a **sky blue** (#0097CE) and **lime green** (#81C341), creating an uplifting and clean impression. White (#FFFFFF) serves as the base, enhancing clarity and focus. The gradient blending of maroons with greens subtly highlights the product's core benefits while maintaining visual balance.
